Computer ScienceğŸ’» Majored in Computer Science for both undergraduation and graduation study.
3 years of learning CS experience in foundamental related courses (e.g. Algorithm, Computer Architecture, Computer Network, Operating System, …). 2 years of learning/research experience on Machine Learning & Graph Neural Network. 2 years of learning/working experience on Software Development & Infrastructure. Containing overlaps among those three experience, of course :-)
Currently have more interest in backend development and infrastructure. But will be happy to seek opportunities of learning frontend framework.
Related Tech Skills Languages: C/C++, Python, Go, Ruby, HTML, CSS, Java, Javascript, Matlab, SQL, Verilog Software Development Tools: Docker, Drone, Git, Kubernetes, Kafka, Airflow, Snowflake, PostgreSQL, Redis AWS Services: API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, OpenSearch, S3, CloudFormation, CodePipeline, SES, SQS, Lex, SageMaker, EventBridge, Personalize, EMR Python Packages for ML: PySpark, Pytorch, Flask, TensorFlow, Plotly, Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib Other Tools: Latex, GEM5, Quartus, Visio, Linux, Android Studio ArtğŸ­ğŸ¤ğŸ¬ My four comfort activities: Musicals, Immersive Plays, Pop Music, Film.
Go to enjoy the above four will heal my soul even if I am alone.
Musicals Sleep No More (Immersive Work of Theatre) Pop Music Film Life TrajectoriesğŸ—º ISFJ (ESTJ Occasionally)â™ˆï¸
